animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am usually yellow as a baby!
💧 I like to play in the water
🗣️ I make a 'quack' sound

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
🐈 I have whiskers.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like bones
🎾 I like to play fetch
🐾 I'm a very good boy!

animal.question: I have big ears and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like orange vegetables
🐰 I hop around
🌱 Some people keep me as a pet

animal.question: I’m a big animal with a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts!
🐘 I'm grey and very big
🚿 I use my nose as a shower

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live underwater
🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can sometimes squirt ink

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I make a 'ooh ooh ah ah' sound
🌴 I live in the jungle
🍌 My favorite food is yellow

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have a very long neck!
🌿 I like to eat green leaves.
🌍 I live in Africa

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse but with stripes
⚫⚪ I am not one solid color.
🌍 I am a wild animal

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs, but I can't fly very well. What am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I live in a very cold place.
🥚 I am a bird, but I can swim really well!
⚫⚪ I am mostly black and white.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm not. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I shine in the dark sky.
🧀 People sometimes say I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me!

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. You can't look directly at me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I appear in the morning.
😎 You need sunscreen because of me.
🌻 Flowers follow me across the sky.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light that twinkles at night. I am very, very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am small but shine very brightly.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🌠 Sometimes I fall from the sky as a shooting...

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am the third planet from the Sun.
💧 I am mostly water.
🌳 I have lots of plants and animals.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars, so many that I look like a fuzzy cloud. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I'm like a big family of stars.
🌌 There are billions of stars in me!
🥛 Our Sun is part of the Milky Way...

cosmos.question: I'm a big, cold planet. I have rings around me made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very beautiful.
🪐 I am the second-largest planet in our solar system.
💨 I am a gas giant!

cosmos.question: I am a hot, fiery ball that shoots through space. Sometimes I leave a bright trail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of ice, dust, and rock.
💨 I can have a tail when I get close to the sun.
💥 Sometimes I hit planets and make big craters.

cosmos.question: I am red and rusty and known as the 'Red Planet'. Space robots have driven all over me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me!
🍫 My surface is red because of iron oxide.
🧊 There is ice on me

cosmos.question: I am a place with no air where astronauts can float. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ It is really, really big.
🚀 Rockets travel through me to reach other planets.
🌌 It starts where Earth's atmosphere ends.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. People used to use me to help them travel. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like animals.
🧭 Sailors use me to navigate.
✨ The Big Dipper is a...
